ygData.subject: RE: [eqbards] eqclient.ini tweaks
ygData.msgSnippet: Ideally I want one that works in all modes - seems pretty much a given that you have to end up in low-res occasionally (check the XP bard - inventory, etc)...
ygData.messageBody:
Ideally I want one that works in all modes - seems pretty much a given that
you have to end up in low-res occasionally (check the XP bard - inventory,
etc)...

I'm currently using Khelan and it's working fine..

Heya Khelan - your name would also make a great Klingon name!

Slyde

-----Original Message-----
From: Kevin L. Crawford [mailto:Lyrnia@...]
Sent: Friday, September 01, 2000 9:22 AM
To: eqbards@egroups.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] eqclient.ini tweaks



I have a full screen one that I'm VERY happy with but it has some bad areas
when in "windowed" view. If you want it I'll send it out later.

Lyrnia Jongleur
Bard of Norrath since Beta 2
----- Original Message -----
From: "Daniel Sniderman" <fuzzbone@...>
To: "EQ Bards" <eqbards@egroups.com>
Sent: Thursday, August 31, 2000 4:52 PM
Subject: [eqbards] eqclient.ini tweaks

> I've been tweaking mine and always seem to make it worse. Anyone have one

different..
